text:
patch that allows the slide webdav client to work with httpclient 3.0 (and
continue to work with httpclient 2.0.x).
creator: ervandew@yahoo.com
antoine@apache.org
text:
Patch committed, thanks for your submission.

I need to check whether I should not take it a step further and check in HttpClient 3.0 instead of 2.0.x in 
the lib folder of webdavclient. And also of the main part.
*** Bug 39220 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***
creator: vgritsenko@apache.org
